Title: Tomorrow Is Forever
Writer: Gwen Bristow (by), Lenore J. Coffee (screen play)
Actors: Claudette Colbert, Orson Welles, George Brent, Lucile Watson
Plot: Elizabeth and John say goodbye as John leaves to go to war. When World War I ends, Elizabeth receives a telegram that John has been killed in action. She finds comfort in Larry and they marry. John returns 20 years later, disfigured, with a new identity, Erik, and an adopted daughter, Margaret. John/Erik and Elizabeth accidentally meet and he learns that he has a son, Drew. John must then decide whether or not to reveal his true identity.
